title: Index Pointing At The Viewer Medium Skin Tone
description: A hand with the index finger extended, pointing directly at the viewer, with a medium skin tone. This emoji is often used to directly address someone, to make a point, or to call out a specific person.
apple_vendor_description: The index-pointing-at-the-viewer emoji on Apple devices features a hand with a medium skin tone, its index finger extended directly towards the user with Apple‚Äôs characteristic glossy 3D shading and precise detail.  The finger is rendered with soft, rounded edges, appearing almost tangible and inviting interaction.  This emoji powerfully directs attention, signifies emphasis, or playfully calls someone out, embodying Apple's clear and intuitive design language for digital communication.
